trans-unit.source: Returns String[] - An array of language codes the spellchecker is enabled for. If this list is empty the spellchecker will fallback to using en-US. By default on launch if this setting is an empty list Electron will try to populate this setting with the current OS locale. This setting is persisted across restarts.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String[] -启用拼写检查器的语言代码数组。如果此列表为空，则拼写检查器将退回到使用 en-US 的状态。默认情况下，启动时如果此设置为空列表，Electron将尝试使用当前的操作系统区域设置填充此设置。此设置在重启后将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Returns String[] - An array of supported formats for the clipboard type.

trans-unit.source: Returns WebFrame - A child of webFrame with the supplied name, null would be returned if there's no such frame or if the frame is not in the current renderer process.

trans-unit.source: Returns WebFrame - that has the supplied routingId, null if not found.
trans-unit.target: 返回 WebFrame -具有提供的 routingId ，如果找不到，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object giving memory usage statistics about the current process. Note that all statistics are reported in Kilobytes. This api should be called after app ready.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object giving memory usage statistics about the entire system. Note that all statistics are reported in Kilobytes.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object with Blink memory information. It can be useful for debugging rendering / DOM related memory issues. Note that all values are reported in Kilobytes.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object with V8 heap statistics. Note that all statistics are reported in Kilobytes.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object with system animation settings.

trans-unit.source: Returns focus to the taskbar notification area. Notification area icons should use this message when they have completed their UI operation. For example, if the icon displays a shortcut menu, but the user presses ESC to cancel it, use tray.focus() to return focus to the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 将焦点返回到任务栏通知区域。通知区域图标完成UI操作后应使用此消息。例如，如果图标显示快捷菜单，但用户按ESC取消它，则使用 tray.focus() 将焦点返回到通知区域。

trans-unit.source: Returns one of several standard system colors that automatically adapt to vibrancy and changes in accessibility settings like 'Increase contrast' and 'Reduce transparency'. See Apple Documentation for more details.

trans-unit.target: 语义承诺

trans-unit.source: Send a message to the main process asynchronously via channel, you can also send arbitrary arguments. Arguments will be serialized in JSON internally and hence no functions or prototype chain will be included.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 异步向主进程发送消息，您也可以发送任意参数。参数将在内部以JSON序列化，因此不包含任何函数或原型链。

trans-unit.source: Send a message to the main process synchronously via channel, you can also send arbitrary arguments. Arguments will be serialized in JSON internally and hence no functions or prototype chain will be included.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 同步向主进程发送消息，您也可以发送任意参数。参数将在内部以JSON序列化，因此不包含任何函数或原型链。

trans-unit.source: Send a message to the main process via channel and expect a result asynchronously. Arguments will be serialized with the Structured Clone Algorithm, just like window.postMessage, so prototype chains will not be included. Sending Functions, Promises, Symbols, WeakMaps, or WeakSets will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 将消息发送到主进程，并异步期望结果。就像 window.postMessage 一样，参数将使用结构化克隆算法进行序列化，因此不包括原型链。发送函数，承诺，符号，WeakMap或WeakSet将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Send a message to the main process via channel and expect a result synchronously. Arguments will be serialized with the Structured Clone Algorithm, just like window.postMessage, so prototype chains will not be included. Sending Functions, Promises, Symbols, WeakMaps, or WeakSets will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 将消息发送到主进程，并同步预期结果。就像 window.postMessage 一样，参数将使用结构化克隆算法进行序列化，因此不包括原型链。发送函数，承诺，符号，WeakMap或WeakSet将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Send a message to the main process, optionally transferring ownership of zero or more MessagePort objects.
trans-unit.target: 将消息发送到主进程，可以选择转移零个或多个 MessagePort 对象的所有权。

trans-unit.source: Send a message to the renderer process, optionally transferring ownership of zero or more [MessagePortMain][] objects.
trans-unit.target: 将消息发送到渲染器进程，可以选择转移零个或多个[ MessagePortMain ] []对象的所有权。

trans-unit.source: Send an asynchronous message to a specific frame in a renderer process via channel, along with arguments. Arguments will be serialized with the Structured Clone Algorithm, just like postMessage, so prototype chains will not be included. Sending Functions, Promises, Symbols, WeakMaps, or WeakSets will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 和参数将异步消息发送到渲染器进程中的特定帧。就像 postMessage 一样，参数将使用结构化克隆算法进行序列化，因此不会包括原型链。发送函数，承诺，符号，WeakMap或WeakSet将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Send an asynchronous message to renderer process via channel, you can also send arbitrary arguments. Arguments will be serialized in JSON internally and hence no functions or prototype chain will be included.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 向渲染器进程发送异步消息，您也可以发送任意参数。参数将在内部以JSON序列化，因此不包含任何函数或原型链。

trans-unit.source: Send an asynchronous message to renderer process via channel, you can also send arbitrary arguments. The renderer process can handle the message by listening to the channel event with the ipcRenderer module.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 向渲染器进程发送异步消息，您也可以发送任意参数。渲染器进程可以通过使用 ipcRenderer 模块监听 channel 事件来处理消息。

trans-unit.source: Send an asynchronous message to the main process via channel, along with arguments. Arguments will be serialized with the Structured Clone Algorithm, just like window.postMessage, so prototype chains will not be included. Sending Functions, Promises, Symbols, WeakMaps, or WeakSets will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 与参数一起向主进程发送异步消息。就像 window.postMessage 一样，参数将使用结构化克隆算法进行序列化，因此不包括原型链。发送函数，承诺，符号，WeakMap或WeakSet将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Send an asynchronous message to the renderer process via channel, along with arguments. Arguments will be serialized with the Structured Clone Algorithm, just like postMessage, so prototype chains will not be included. Sending Functions, Promises, Symbols, WeakMaps, or WeakSets will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 通过 channel 和参数将异步消息发送到渲染器进程。就像 postMessage 一样，参数将使用结构化克隆算法进行序列化，因此不会包括原型链。发送函数，承诺，符号，WeakMap或WeakSet将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Set an extra parameter to be sent with the crash report. The values specified here will be sent in addition to any values set via the extra option when start was called. trans-unit.source: Sets the certificate verify proc for session, the proc will be called with proc(request, callback) whenever a server certificate verification is requested. Calling callback(0) accepts the certificate, calling callback(-2) rejects it.
trans-unit.target: 设置证书验证PROC session ，该 proc 将被用 proc(request, callback) 每当服务器证书验证请求。调用 callback(0) 接受证书，调用 callback(-2) 拒绝证书。

trans-unit.target: 设置当前应用程序的计数器徽章。将计数设置为 0 将隐藏徽章。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current executable as the default handler for a protocol (aka URI scheme). It allows you to integrate your app deeper into the operating system. Once registered, all links with your-protocol:// will be opened with the current executable. The whole link, including protocol, will be passed to your application as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将当前可执行文件设置为协议（即URI方案）的默认处理程序。它使您可以将应用程序更深入地集成到操作系统中。注册后，所有带有 your-protocol:// 的链接都将使用当前的可执行文件打开。整个链接（包括协议）将作为参数传递到您的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file descriptor soft limit to maxDescriptors or the OS hard limit, whichever is lower for the current process.
trans-unit.target: 将文件描述符的软限制设置为 maxDescriptors 或OS硬限制，以当前进程中的较低者为准。

trans-unit.source: Sets the handler which can be used to respond to permission checks for the session. Returning true will allow the permission and false will reject it. To clear the handler, call setPermissionCheckHandler(null).
trans-unit.target: 设置可用于响应 session 权限检查的处理程序。返回 true 将允许该权限，而 false 将拒绝它。要清除处理程序，请调用 setPermissionCheckHandler(null) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the handler which can be used to respond to permission requests for the session. Calling callback(true) will allow the permission and callback(false) will reject it. To clear the handler, call setPermissionRequestHandler(null).
trans-unit.target: 设置可用于响应 session 权限请求的处理程序。调用 callback(true) 将允许该权限，而 callback(false) 将拒绝它。要清除处理程序，请调用 setPermissionRequestHandler(null) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the region of the window to show as the thumbnail image displayed when hovering over the window in the taskbar. You can reset the thumbnail to be the entire window by specifying an empty region: { x: 0, y: 0, width: 0, height: 0 }.
trans-unit.target: 设置窗口的区域以将其悬停在任务栏中的窗口上时显示为缩略图。您可以通过指定空白区域 { x: 0, y: 0, width: 0, height: 0 } 来将缩略图重置为整个窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sets the region of the window to show as the thumbnail image displayed when hovering over the window in the taskbar. You can reset the thumbnail to be the entire window by specifying an empty region: {x: 0, y: 0, width: 0, height: 0}.
trans-unit.target: 设置窗口的区域以将其悬停在任务栏中的窗口上时显示为缩略图。您可以通过指定空白区域 {x: 0, y: 0, width: 0, height: 0} 来将缩略图重置为整个窗口。

trans-unit.source: Sets the session used by the page. If partition starts with persist:, the page will use a persistent session available to all pages in the app with the same partition. if there is no persist: prefix, the page will use an in-memory session. By assigning the same partition, multiple pages can share the same session. If the partition is unset then default session of the app will be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置页面使用的会话。如果 partition 以 persist: 开始，则页面将使用一个持久会话，该会话可用于应用程序中具有相同 partition 的所有页面。如果没有 persist: 前缀，则该页面将使用内存会话。通过分配相同的 partition ，多个页面可以共享同一会话。如果未设置 partition ，则将使用应用程序的默认会话。

trans-unit.source: Setting a window shape determines the area within the window where the system permits drawing and user interaction. Mouse events outside of the region will not be received by that window, but will fall through to whatever is behind the window.

In this mode, a progress bar remains active but does not show an actual percentage. Use this mode for situations when you do not know how long an operation will take to complete.
trans-unit.target: 将参数设置为负值（例如 -1 ）将删除进度条，而将其设置为大于 1 的值（例如 2 ）会将进度条切换为不确定模式（仅Windows-否则将限制为100％ ）。在此模式下，进度条保持活动状态，但未显示实际百分比。对于不知道需要多长时间才能完成操作的情况，请使用此模式。

trans-unit.source: Since Chromium is quite a large project, the final linking stage can take quite a few minutes, which makes it hard for development. In order to solve this, Chromium introduced the "component build", which builds each component as a separate shared library, making linking very quick but sacrificing file size and performance.
trans-unit.target: 由于Chromium是一个相当庞大的项目,最后的链接阶段可能需要相当长的时间,这给开发带来了困难。为了解决这个问题,Chromium引入了 "组件构建",将每个组件作为一个独立的共享库来构建,使得链接速度非常快,但牺牲了文件大小和性能。

trans-unit.source: Since Electron 8, stabilization branches are always major version lines, and named against the following template $MAJOR-x-y e.g. 8-x-y. Prior to that we used minor version lines and named them as $MAJOR-$MINOR-x e.g. 2-0-x
trans-unit.target: 从Electron 8开始，稳定分支始终是主要版本行，并根据以下模板 $MAJOR-x-y 命名，例如 8-x-y 。在此之前，我们使用次要版本行并将其命名为 $MAJOR-$MINOR-x 例如 2-0-x

trans-unit.source: Since Electron uses Chromium for displaying web pages, Chromium's multi-process architecture is also used. Each web page in Electron runs in its own process, which is called the renderer process.
trans-unit.target: 由于Electron使用Chromium来显示网页，因此也使用了Chromium的多进程体系结构。Electron中的每个网页都在其自己的进程中运行，该进程称为渲染器进程。

trans-unit.source: Since WebViews live in the DOM, they can be created by a script running on your website even if Node.js integration is otherwise disabled.
trans-unit.target: 由于WebViews活在DOM中,即使Node.js集成被禁用,它们也可以通过运行在网站上的脚本来创建。

trans-unit.source: Since a major feature in Electron is the ability to run Node.js in the renderer process (making it easier to develop desktop applications using web technologies), the sandbox is disabled by electron. This is because most Node.js APIs require system access. require() for example, is not possible without file system permissions, which are not available in a sandboxed environment.
trans-unit.target: 由于Electron的主要功能是能够在渲染器进程中运行Node.js（使使用Web技术开发桌面应用程序更加容易），因此沙箱会被电子禁用。这是因为大多数Node.js API需要系统访问权限。例如，没有文件系统权限就无法使用 require() ，而文件系统权限在沙盒环境中不可用。

trans-unit.source: Since a major feature in electron is the ability to run node.js in the renderer process (making it easier to develop desktop applications using web technologies), the sandbox is disabled by electron. This is because most node.js APIs require system access. require() for example, is not possible without file system permissions, which are not available in a sandboxed environment.
trans-unit.target: 由于电子的主要功能是能够在渲染器进程中运行node.js（使使用Web技术开发桌面应用程序更加容易），因此沙箱会被电子禁用。这是因为大多数node.js API都需要系统访问。例如，没有文件系统权限就无法使用 require() ，而文件系统权限在沙盒环境中不可用。

trans-unit.source: Since communication between the processes is possible, a renderer process can call upon the main process to perform tasks. Electron comes with a module called remote that exposes APIs usually only available on the main process. In order to create a BrowserWindow from a renderer process, we'd use the remote as a middle-man:
trans-unit.target: 由于进程之间可以进行通信，因此渲染器进程可以调用主进程来执行任务。Electron带有一个名为 remote 的模块，该模块公开通常仅在主进程中可用的API。为了从渲染器进程创建 BrowserWindow ，我们将遥控器用作中间人：

trans-unit.source: Since many cases return true, you should treat with care situations of getting false positives, as we cannot always assume that true value means that Electron can access the Internet. For example, in cases when the computer is running a virtualization software that has virtual Ethernet adapters in "always connected" state. Therefore, if you want to determine the Internet access status of Electron, you should develop additional means for this check.
trans-unit.target: 由于许多情况下返回 true ，因此您应谨慎对待获得误报的情况，因为我们不能总是假设 true 值意味着Electron可以访问互联网。例如，在计算机运行虚拟化软件的情况下，虚拟化软件具有处于“始终连接”状态的虚拟以太网适配器。因此，如果要确定Electron的Internet访问状态，则应开发其他方法进行检查。

trans-unit.source: Since rendering untrusted content in electron is still uncharted territory, the APIs exposed to the sandbox preload script should be considered more unstable than the rest of electron APIs, and may have breaking changes to fix security issues.
trans-unit.target: 由于在电子中渲染不受信任的内容仍然是未知领域,沙盒预加载脚本暴露的API应该被认为比其他电子API更不稳定,可能会有突破性的变化来修复安全问题。

trans-unit.target: 从v0.34.0开始,Electron允许向Mac App Store(MAS)提交打包的应用程序。本指南提供了以下信息:如何提交您的应用程序和MAS构建的限制。

trans-unit.source: Some bug in V8 engine may allow malicious code to access the renderer preload APIs, effectively granting full access to the system through the remote module.

trans-unit.source: Some bug in the V8 engine may allow malicious code to access the renderer preload APIs, effectively granting full access to the system through the remote module. Therefore, it is highly recommended to disable the remote module. If disabling is not feasible, you should selectively filter the remote module.
trans-unit.target: V8引擎中的某些错误可能允许恶意代码访问渲染器预加载API，从而有效地授予通过 remote 模块对系统的完全访问权限。因此，强烈建议禁用 remote 模块。如果禁用是不可行的，则应该有选择地过滤 remote 模块。

trans-unit.source: Some security features in Chrome (such as Safe Browsing and Certificate Transparency) require a centralized authority and dedicated servers, both of which run counter to the goals of the Electron project. As such, we disable those features in Electron, at the cost of the associated security they would otherwise bring.
trans-unit.target: Chrome 浏览器中的一些安全功能(如安全浏览和证书透明)需要一个中央权威机构和专用服务器,而这两者都与 Electron 项目的目标相悖。因此,我们在Electron中禁用了这些功能,但代价是它们会带来相关的安全性。

trans-unit.source: Some tests which rely on precise pixel measurements may not work correctly on devices with Hi-DPI screen settings due to floating point precision errors. To run these tests correctly, make sure the device is set to 100% scaling.

trans-unit.source: Squirrel is an open-source framework that enables Electron apps to update automatically as new versions are released. See the autoUpdater API for info about getting started with Squirrel.
trans-unit.target: Squirrel是一个开放源代码框架，可让Electron应用程序在发布新版本时自动更新。有关使用Squirrel的信息，请参见autoUpdater API。

trans-unit.source: Stabilization Branches
trans-unit.target: 稳定处

trans-unit.source: Stabilization branches are always either major or minor version lines, and named against the following template $MAJOR-$MINOR-x e.g. 2-0-x.
trans-unit.target: 稳定分支始终是主要或次要版本行，并根据以下模板 $MAJOR-$MINOR-x 命名，例如 2-0-x 。

trans-unit.source: Stabilization branches are branches that run parallel to master, taking in only cherry-picked commits that are related to security or stability. These branches are never merged back to master.
trans-unit.target: 稳定分支是与主分支平行运行的分支,只接收与安全或稳定相关的挑剔的提交。这些分支永远不会被合并回主分支。

trans-unit.source: That level of modularity and extendability ensures that all developers working with Electron, both big and small in team-size, are never restricted in what they can or cannot do at any time during their development lifecycle. However, for many developers, one of the community-driven boilerplates or command line tools might make it dramatically easier to compile, package, and release an app.
trans-unit.target: 这种程度的模块化和可扩展性确保了所有使用Electron工作的开发者,无论团队规模大小,都不会在开发生命周期的任何时候受到限制,不能或不能做什么。然而,对于许多开发者来说,社区驱动的锅炉模板或命令行工具之一可能会使编译、打包和发布应用变得更加容易。

trans-unit.source: The before-input-event event is emitted before dispatching keydown and keyup events in the page. It can be used to catch and handle custom shortcuts that are not visible in the menu.
trans-unit.target: 在 before-input-event 事件分派之前发出 keydown 和 keyup 在页面事件。它可用于捕获和处理菜单中不可见的自定义快捷方式。

trans-unit.target: 浏览器窗口的 setMenu 方法可以设置某些浏览器窗口的菜单。

trans-unit.source: The node-pre-gyp tool provides a way to deploy native Node modules with prebuilt binaries, and many popular modules are using it.
trans-unit.target: 该 node-pre-gyp 工具提供了一种方法来部署预编译的二进制，和许多流行的模块本地节点模块都在使用它。

trans-unit.source: The "Awesome Electron" list contains more tools and boilerplates to choose from. If you find the length of the list intimidating, don't forget that adding tools as you go along is a valid approach, too.
trans-unit.target: 在“真棒电子”列表中包含了更多的工具和boilerplates选择。如果您发现列表的长度令人生畏，请不要忘记在进行过程中添加工具也是一种有效的方法。

trans-unit.source: The -x flag should be used with any required module that is already exposed in the preload scope, and tells browserify to use the enclosing require function for it. --insert-global-vars will ensure that process, Buffer and setImmediate are also taken from the enclosing scope(normally browserify injects code for those).
trans-unit.target: 在 -x 标志应与在预压范围已经暴露任何所需的模块一起使用，并告诉browserify使用封闭 require 功能它。 --insert-global-vars 将确保 process ， Buffer 和 setImmediate 也从封闭范围中获取（通常通过browserify为其注入代码）。

trans-unit.source: The remote module provides a way for the renderer processes to access APIs normally only available in the main process. Using it, a renderer can invoke methods of a main process object without explicitly sending inter-process messages. If your desktop application does not run untrusted content, this can be a useful way to have your renderer processes access and work with modules that are only available to the main process, such as GUI-related modules (dialogs, menus, etc.).
trans-unit.target: 所述 remote 模块，用于呈现器进程通常只在主进程可用的访问API提供了一种方法。使用它，渲染器可以调用主流程对象的方法，而无需显式发送进程间消息。如果您的桌面应用程序不运行不受信任的内容，这可能是使渲染器进程访问并使用仅对主进程可用的模块（例如与GUI相关的模块（对话框，菜单等））的有用方法。

trans-unit.source: The API is based on the Chromium permissions API and implements the same types of permissions.
trans-unit.target: 该API基于Chromium权限API，并实现相同类型的权限。

trans-unit.source: The C Run-time Library (CRT) is the part of the C++ Standard Library that incorporates the ISO C99 standard library. The Visual C++ libraries that implement the CRT support native code development, and both mixed native and managed code, and pure managed code for .NET development.
trans-unit.target: C运行时库(CRT)是C++标准库中包含ISO C99标准库的部分。实现CRT的Visual C++库支持原生代码开发,同时支持原生代码和托管代码混合开发,支持.NET开发的纯托管代码。

trans-unit.source: The C++ code uses a lot of Chromium's abstractions and types, so it's recommended to get acquainted with them. A good place to start is Chromium's Important Abstractions and Data Structures document. The document mentions some special types, scoped types (that automatically release their memory when going out of scope), logging mechanisms etc.
trans-unit.target: C ++代码使用了大量Chromium的抽象和类型，因此建议您熟悉它们。Chromium的重要抽象和数据结构文档是一个不错的起点。该文档提到了一些特殊类型，范围类型（​​超出范围时会自动释放其内存），日志记录机制等。

trans-unit.source: The Chrome version of Electron is usually bumped within one or two weeks after a new stable Chrome version gets released. This estimate is not guaranteed and depends on the amount of work involved with upgrading.
trans-unit.target: 在新的Chrome稳定版发布后,Chrome版本的Electron通常会在一到两周内进行升级。这个估计时间并不保证,取决于升级所涉及的工作量。

trans-unit.source: The DOM's File interface provides abstraction around native files in order to let users work on native files directly with the HTML5 file API. Electron has added a path attribute to the File interface which exposes the file's real path on filesystem.
trans-unit.target: DOM的File接口提供了本机文件周围的抽象，以便让用户直接使用HTML5文件API处理本机文件。 Electron已向 File 接口添加了 path 属性，该属性公开了文件在文件系统上的真实路径。

trans-unit.source: The DevTools in an Electron browser window can only debug JavaScript that's executed in that window (i.e. the web pages). To debug JavaScript that's executed in the main process you will need to use an external debugger and launch Electron with the --inspect or --inspect-brk switch.
trans-unit.target: Electron浏览器窗口中的DevTools只能调试在该窗口（即网页）中执行的JavaScript。要调试在主要过程中执行的JavaScript，您将需要使用外部调试器，并使用 --inspect 或 --inspect-brk 开关启动Electron 。

trans-unit.source: The Main process creates web pages by creating BrowserWindow instances. Each BrowserWindow instance runs the web page in its Renderer process. When a BrowserWindow instance is destroyed, the corresponding Renderer process gets terminated as well.
trans-unit.target: Main进程通过创建 BrowserWindow 实例来创建网页。每个 BrowserWindow 实例在其Renderer进程中运行网页。当 BrowserWindow 实例被破坏，相应的渲染处理被终止为好。

trans-unit.source: The Main process manages all web pages and their corresponding Renderer processes.
trans-unit.target: Main进程管理所有网页及其相应的Renderer进程。

trans-unit.source: The Python version we are using now is Python 2.7.
trans-unit.target: 我们现在使用的Python版本是Python 2.7。

trans-unit.source: The Renderer process communicates with the Main process via IPC to perform GUI operations in a web page. Calling native GUI-related APIs from the Renderer process directly is restricted due to security concerns and potential resource leakage.
trans-unit.target: Renderer进程通过IPC与Main进程进行通信，以在网页中执行GUI操作。由于安全问题和潜在的资源泄漏，直接从Renderer进程调用与本机GUI相关的API受到限制。

trans-unit.source: The Renderer process manages only the corresponding web page. A crash in one Renderer process does not affect other Renderer processes.
trans-unit.target: 渲染器进程仅管理相应的网页。一个Renderer进程中的崩溃不会影响其他Renderer进程。

Or, you can download the standalone SDK installer and use it to install the Debugging Tools.

trans-unit.source: The files in /chromium_src tend to be pieces of Chromium that aren't part of the content layer. For example to implement Pepper API, we need some wiring similar to what official Chrome does. We could have built the relevant sources as a part of libcc but most often we don't require all the features (some tend to be proprietary, analytics stuff) so we took parts of the code. These could have easily been patches in libcc, but at the time when these were written the goal of libcc was to maintain very minimal patches and chromium_src changes tend to be big ones. Also, note that these patches can never be upstreamed unlike other libcc patches we maintain now.
trans-unit.target: /chromium_src 中的文件往往是不属于内容层的Chromium。例如，要实现Pepper API，我们需要一些类似于官方Chrome的接线。我们本可以将相关源构建为libcc的一部分，但是大多数情况下，我们不需要所有功能（某些功能往往是专有的，分析功能），因此我们使用了部分代码。这些可能很容易是libcc中的补丁，但是在编写这些补丁时，libcc的目标是保持非常小的补丁，而chromium_src的变化往往很大。另外，请注意，与我们现在维护的其他libcc修补程序不同，这些修补程序永远无法上游。

trans-unit.source: The first 3 options are trace recording modes and hence mutually exclusive. If more than one trace recording modes appear in the traceOptions string, the last one takes precedence. If none of the trace recording modes are specified, recording mode is record-until-full.
trans-unit.target: 前三个选项是跟踪记录模式，因此是互斥的。如果 traceOptions 字符串中出现多个跟踪记录模式，则最后一种优先。如果未指定任何跟踪记录模式，则记录模式为 record-until-full 。

trans-unit.source: The installer generated with Squirrel will create a shortcut icon with an Application User Model ID in the format of com.squirrel.PACKAGE_ID.YOUR_EXE_WITHOUT_DOT_EXE, examples are com.squirrel.slack.Slack and com.squirrel.code.Code. You have to use the same ID for your app with app.setAppUserModelId API, otherwise Windows will not be able to pin your app properly in task bar.
trans-unit.target: 使用Squirrel生成的安装程序将以 com.squirrel.PACKAGE_ID.YOUR_EXE_WITHOUT_DOT_EXE 的格式创建具有应用程序用户模型ID的快捷方式图标，示例为 com.squirrel.slack.Slack 和 com.squirrel.code.Code 。您必须通过 app.setAppUserModelId API 为您的应用使用相同的ID ，否则Windows将无法在任务栏中正确固定您的应用。

trans-unit.source: The intention is for these overrides to become disabled by default and then at some point in the future this property will be removed. This property impacts which native modules you can use in the renderer process. For more information on the direction Electron is going with renderer process restarts and usage of native modules in the renderer process please check out this Tracking Issue.
trans-unit.target: 目的是使这些替代默认情况下处于禁用状态，然后在将来的某个时候将删除此属性。此属性影响您可以在渲染器过程中使用哪些本机模块。有关Electron随着渲染器进程重新启动以及渲染器进程中本机模块的使用方向的更多信息，请查看此跟踪问题。

trans-unit.source: The latest stable release unilaterally receives all fixes from master, and the version prior to that receives the vast majority of those fixes as time and bandwidth warrants. The oldest supported release line will receive only security fixes directly.
trans-unit.target: 最新的稳定版本会单方面接收 master 的所有修补程序，而之前的版本会在时间和带宽要求范围内接收绝大多数的修补程序。受支持的最早的发行版将仅直接收到安全修复程序。

trans-unit.source: The latest three stable major versions are supported by the Electron team. For example, if the latest release is 6.1.x, then the 5.0.x as well as the 4.2.x series are supported. We only support the latest minor release for each stable release series. This means that in the case of a security fix 6.1.x will receive the fix, but we will not release a new version of 6.0.x.
trans-unit.target: Electron团队支持最新的三个稳定的主要版本。例如，如果最新版本是6.1.x，则支持5.0.x以及4.2.x系列。对于每个稳定版本系列，我们仅支持最新的次要版本。这意味着在安全修复程序的情况下，6.1.x将收到此修复程序，但我们不会发布6.0.x的新版本。

trans-unit.source: The latest three release branches are supported by the Electron team. For example, if the latest release is 2.0.x, then the 2-0-x series is supported, as are the two previous release series 1-7-x and 1-8-x.
trans-unit.target: Electron团队支持最新的三个版本分支。例如,如果最新的版本是2.0.x,那么就支持2-0-x系列,之前的两个版本系列1-7-x和1-8-x也支持。

trans-unit.source: The main process creates web pages by creating BrowserWindow instances. Each BrowserWindow instance runs the web page in its own renderer process. When a BrowserWindow instance is destroyed, the corresponding renderer process is also terminated.
trans-unit.target: 主要过程通过创建 BrowserWindow 实例来创建网页。每个 BrowserWindow 实例都在其自己的渲染器进程中运行网页。当 BrowserWindow 实例被破坏，相应的渲染过程也终止。

trans-unit.source: The main process handles it by listening for channel with ipcMain module, and replies by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 主进程通过使用 ipcMain 模块监听 channel 处理它，并通过设置 event.returnValue 进行回复。

trans-unit.source: The main process handles it by listening for channel with ipcMain module.
trans-unit.target: 主进程通过使用 ipcMain 模块监听 channel 处理它。

trans-unit.source: The main process handles it by listening for channel with the ipcMain module.

trans-unit.source: The main process manages all web pages and their corresponding renderer processes. Each renderer process is isolated and only cares about the web page running in it.
trans-unit.target: 主进程管理所有的网页和它们对应的渲染器进程。每个渲染器进程都是孤立的,只关心运行在其中的网页。

trans-unit.source: The main process, commonly a file named main.js, is the entry point to every Electron app. It controls the life of the app, from open to close. It also manages native elements such as the Menu, Menu Bar, Dock, Tray, etc. The main process is responsible for creating each new renderer process in the app. The full Node API is built in.
trans-unit.target: 主进程通常是一个名为 main.js 的文件，它是每个Electron应用程序的入口。从打开到关闭，它都会控制应用程序的寿命。它还管理菜单，菜单栏，Dock，Tray等本地元素。主要过程负责在应用程序中创建每个新的渲染器过程。内置了完整的Node API。

trans-unit.source: The main script may look as follows:
trans-unit.target: 主脚本的内容如下:

trans-unit.source: The main script specifies the entry point of your Electron application (in our case, the main.js file) that will run the Main process. Typically, the script that runs in the Main process controls the lifecycle of the application, displays the graphical user interface and its elements, performs native operating system interactions, and creates Renderer processes within web pages. An Electron application can have only one Main process.
trans-unit.target: 主脚本指定将运行Main进程的Electron应用程序的入口点（在本例中为 main.js 文件）。通常，在Main进程中运行的脚本控制应用程序的生命周期，显示图形用户界面及其元素，执行本机操作系统交互，并在网页内创建Renderer进程。一个电子应用程序只能有一个主进程。

trans-unit.source: The method underlying this event is built to handle older macOS-style trackpad swiping, where the content on the screen doesn't move with the swipe. Most macOS trackpads are not configured to allow this kind of swiping anymore, so in order for it to emit properly the 'Swipe between pages' preference in System Preferences > Trackpad > More Gestures must be set to 'Swipe with two or three fingers'.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的基础方法旨在处理较旧的macOS样式的触控板滑动，其中屏幕上的内容不会随着滑动而移动。大多数macOS触控板都不再配置为允许这种滑动，因此为了使其正确发出“ System Preferences > Trackpad > More Gestures ”中的“页面之间滑动”首选项，必须将其设置为“用两根或三根手指滑动”。

trans-unit.source: The method will also not return if the extension's manifest is missing or incomplete.
trans-unit.target: 如果扩展的清单缺失或不完整,该方法也不会返回。

trans-unit.source: The methods of WebRequest accept an optional filter and a listener. The listener will be called with listener(details) when the API's event has happened. The details object describes the request.
trans-unit.target: WebRequest 的方法接受可选的 filter 和 listener 。该 listener 将被用 listener(details) 时，API的事件已经发生。的 details 对象描述该请求。

trans-unit.source: The methods of WebRequest accept an optional filter and a listener. The listener will be called with listener(details) when the API's event has happened. The details object describes the request. Passing null as listener will unsubscribe from the event.
trans-unit.target: WebRequest 的方法接受可选的 filter 和 listener 。该 listener 将被用 listener(details) 时，API的事件已经发生。的 details 对象描述该请求。传递 null 为 listener 将取消从事件。

trans-unit.source: The most comprehensive tool to debug individual renderer processes is the Chromium Developer Toolset. It is available for all renderer processes, including instances of BrowserWindow, BrowserView, and WebView. You can open them programmatically by calling the openDevTools() API on the webContents of the instance:
trans-unit.target: Chromium Developer Toolset是调试单个渲染器进程的最全面的工具。它可用于所有渲染器进程，包括 BrowserWindow ， BrowserView 和 WebView 的实例。您可以通过在实例的 webContents 上调用 openDevTools() API以编程方式打开它们：

trans-unit.source: The name of the extension is returned by BrowserWindow.addDevToolsExtension, and you can pass the name of the extension to the BrowserWindow.removeDevToolsExtension API to unload it.
trans-unit.target: 扩展名由 BrowserWindow.addDevToolsExtension 返回，您可以将扩展名传递给 BrowserWindow.removeDevToolsExtension API来卸载它。

trans-unit.source: The native Node modules are supported by Electron, but since Electron is very likely to use a different V8 version from the Node binary installed in your system, you have to manually specify the location of Electron's headers when building native modules.
trans-unit.target: Electron支持原生的Node模块,但由于Electron很可能使用与系统中安装的Node二进制文件不同的V8版本,所以在构建原生模块时,你必须手动指定Electron的头文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: The native type of the handle is HWND on Windows, NSView* on macOS, and Window (unsigned long) on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 句柄的本机类型在Windows上是 HWND ，在macOS 上是 NSView* ，在Linux上是 Window （ unsigned long ）。

trans-unit.source: The newly created BrowserWindow will inherit the parent window's options by default. To override inherited options you can set them in the features string.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，新创建的 BrowserWindow 将继承父窗口的选项。要覆盖继承的选项，您可以在 features 字符串中进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The number of buttons in thumbnail toolbar should be no greater than 7 due to the limited room. Once you setup the thumbnail toolbar, the toolbar cannot be removed due to the platform's limitation. But you can call the API with an empty array to clean the buttons.
trans-unit.target: 由于空间有限,缩略图工具栏的按钮数量不应超过7个。一旦你设置了缩略图工具栏,由于平台的限制,工具栏是无法删除的。但你可以用空数组调用API来清理按钮。

trans-unit.source: The number represented by status means different things on different platforms: on Windows its potential values can be found here, and on Linux and macOS they can be found here.
trans-unit.target: status 表示的数字在不同平台上的含义不同：在Windows上可以在此处找到其潜在值，在Linux和macOS上可以在此处找到它们的潜在值。

trans-unit.source: The official symbol server URL for Electron is https://electron-symbols.githubapp.com. You cannot visit this URL directly, you must add it to the symbol path of your debugging tool. In the examples below, a local cache directory is used to avoid repeatedly fetching the PDB from the server. Replace c:\code\symbols with an appropriate cache directory on your machine.
trans-unit.target: Electron的官方符号服务器URL为https://electron-symbols.githubapp.com。您不能直接访问此URL，必须将其添加到调试工具的符号路径中。在下面的示例中，使用本地缓存目录来避免重复从服务器获取PDB。将 c:\code\symbols 替换为计算机上适当的缓存目录。

trans-unit.source: The official symbol server URL for Electron is https://symbols.electronjs.org. You cannot visit this URL directly, you must add it to the symbol path of your debugging tool. In the examples below, a local cache directory is used to avoid repeatedly fetching the PDB from the server. Replace c:\code\symbols with an appropriate cache directory on your machine.
trans-unit.target: Electron的官方符号服务器URL为https://symbols.electronjs.org。您不能直接访问此URL，必须将其添加到调试工具的符号路径中。在下面的示例中，使用本地缓存目录来避免重复从服务器获取PDB。将 c:\code\symbols 替换为计算机上适当的缓存目录。

trans-unit.target: ia32 的预构建ia32（ i686 ）和 x64 （ amd64 ）二进制文件是在Ubuntu 12.04上构建的， armv7l 二进制文件是针对ARM v7，带有硬浮ABI和NEON的Debian Wheezy构建的。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way for Unity to instruct your application on what to do is using parameters. You can find them in your application in the global variable process.argv.
trans-unit.target: Unity指导应用程序执行操作的首选方法是使用参数。您可以在应用程序的全局变量 process.argv 中找到它们。

trans-unit.source: The preload script can indirectly access all APIs from the main process through the remote and ipcRenderer modules.
trans-unit.target: 预加载脚本可以通过 remote 和 ipcRenderer 模块从主进程间接访问所有API 。

trans-unit.source: The preload script can indirectly access all APIs from the main process through the remote and ipcRenderer modules. This is how fs (used above) and other modules are implemented: They are proxies to remote counterparts in the main process.
trans-unit.target: 预加载脚本可以通过 remote 和 ipcRenderer 模块从主进程间接访问所有API 。这就是 fs （上面使用的）和其他模块的实现方式：它们是主过程中远程对象的代理。

trans-unit.source: The preload script must be contained in a single script, but it is possible to have complex preload code composed with multiple modules by using a tool like browserify, as explained below. In fact, browserify is already used by electron to provide a node-like environment to the preload script.
trans-unit.target: 预载脚本必须包含在单个脚本中,但也可以通过使用像 browserify 这样的工具,让复杂的预载代码由多个模块组成,如下所述。事实上,Browserify已经被electron用来为预加载脚本提供一个类似节点的环境。

trans-unit.source: The prepare release script will do the following: 1. Check if a release is already in process and if so it will halt. 2. Create a release branch. 3. Bump the version number in several files. See this bump commit for an example. 4. Create a draft release on GitHub with auto-generated release notes. 5. Push the release branch. 6. Call the APIs to run the release builds.
trans-unit.target: 准备发布脚本将执行以下操作：1.检查发布是否已在进行中，如果停止，则它将停止。2.创建一个发布分支。3.将版本号合并到几个文件中。有关示例，请参见此凹凸提交。4.使用自动生成的发行说明在GitHub上创建发行草案。5.推动释放分支。6.调用API以运行发行版。

trans-unit.source: The property is only available in session's will-download callback function. If user doesn't set the save path via the property, Electron will use the original routine to determine the save path; this usually prompts a save dialog.
trans-unit.target: 该属性仅在会话的 will-download 回调函数中可用。如果用户未通过该属性设置保存路径，Electron将使用原始例程来确定保存路径；这通常会提示一个保存对话框。

trans-unit.source: The proxy has limited standard functionality implemented to be compatible with traditional web pages. For full control of the new window you should create a BrowserWindow directly.

trans-unit.source: The renderer process can handle the message by listening to channel with the ipcRenderer module.

On Windows or macOS, it will do nothing.

trans-unit.source: There may be instances where you want to respond to these events in the main process as well. trans-unit.source: There may be situations when you want to respond to online/offline events in the Main process as well. The Main process, however, does not have a navigator object and cannot detect these events directly. In this case, you need to forward the events to the Main process using Electron's inter-process communication (IPC) utilities.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，您也可能希望在Main流程中响应在线/离线事件。但是，Main进程没有 navigator 对象，因此无法直接检测到这些事件。在这种情况下，您需要使用Electron的进程间通信（IPC）实用程序将事件转发到主进程。

trans-unit.source: This API itself will not protect your user data; rather, it is a mechanism to allow you to do so. Native apps will need to set Access Control Constants like kSecAccessControlUserPresence on their keychain entry so that reading it would auto-prompt for Touch ID biometric consent. This could be done with node-keytar, such that one would store an encryption key with node-keytar and only fetch it if promptTouchID() resolves.
trans-unit.target: 该API本身不会保护您的用户数据；相反，它是一种允许您这样做的机制。本机应用程序需要在其钥匙串条目上设置访问控制常量（例如 kSecAccessControlUserPresence )，以便读取该控件时将自动提示输入Touch ID生物识别信息。这可以使用 node-keytar 来完成，这样一个人就可以将加密密钥与 node-keytar 一起存储，并且只有在 promptTouchID() 解析后才能获取。

trans-unit.source: This API must be called after the ready event is emitted.

trans-unit.source: This bug is a "feature" of Windows' command prompt. Since each accidental click will pause the build process, you might want to disable this feature in the command prompt properties.

trans-unit.source: This event will be emitted after did-start-navigation and always before the did-redirect-navigation event for the same navigation.
trans-unit.target: 对于同一导航，此事件将在 did-start-navigation 之后且始终在 did-redirect-navigation 事件之前发出。

trans-unit.source: This is the user agent that will be used when no user agent is set at the webContents or session level. It is useful for ensuring that your entire app has the same user agent. Set to a custom value as early as possible in your app's initialization to ensure that your overridden value is used.

trans-unit.source: This is the web page you want to display once the application is initialized. This web page represents the Renderer process. You can create multiple browser windows, where each window uses its own independent Renderer. Each window can optionally be granted with full access to Node.js API through the nodeIntegration preference.
trans-unit.target: 初始化应用程序后，这就是您要显示的网页。该网页代表渲染器过程。您可以创建多个浏览器窗口，其中每个窗口使用其自己的独立渲染器。您可以选择通过 nodeIntegration 首选项为每个窗口授予对Node.js API的完全访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This method can only be called before app is ready.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法只能在应用程序准备好之前被调用。

trans-unit.source: This method checks if the current executable as the default handler for a protocol (aka URI scheme). If so, it will remove the app as the default handler.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查当前可执行文件是否为协议(也就是URI方案)的默认处理程序。如果是,它将删除该应用程序作为默认处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This method checks if the current executable is the default handler for a protocol (aka URI scheme). If so, it will return true. Otherwise, it will return false.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法检查当前的可执行文件是否是一个协议(也就是URI方案)的默认处理程序。如果是,它将返回true。否则,它将返回false。

trans-unit.source: This method guarantees that all beforeunload and unload event handlers are correctly executed. It is possible that a window cancels the quitting by returning false in the beforeunload event handler.
trans-unit.target: 此方法保证正确执行所有 beforeunload 和 unload 事件处理程序。窗口可能会通过在 beforeunload 事件处理程序中返回 false 来取消退出。

trans-unit.source: This method makes your application a Single Instance Application - instead of allowing multiple instances of your app to run, this will ensure that only a single instance of your app is running, and other instances signal this instance and exit.
trans-unit.target: 该方法使您的应用程序成为单一实例应用程序--而不是让您的应用程序的多个实例运行,这将确保您的应用程序只有一个实例在运行,其他实例会向该实例发出信号并退出。

trans-unit.source: This method must be called before using any other crashReporter APIs. Once initialized this way, the crashpad handler collects crashes from all subsequently created processes. The crash reporter cannot be disabled once started.
trans-unit.target: 在使用任何其他 crashReporter API之前，必须先调用此方法。一旦以这种方式初始化，崩溃板处理程序将从所有随后创建的进程中收集崩溃。启动后无法禁用崩溃报告器。

trans-unit.source: This method returns false if your process is the primary instance of the application and your app should continue loading. And returns true if your process has sent its parameters to another instance, and you should immediately quit.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的进程是应用程序的主要实例，并且您的应用程序应继续加载，则此方法返回 false 。如果您的进程已将其参数发送到另一个实例，则返回 true ，并且您应立即退出。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a promise that contains the application name, icon and path of the default handler for the protocol (aka URI scheme) of a URL.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回一个包含应用程序名称、图标和URL协议(也就是URI方案)默认处理程序的路径的承诺。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the application name of the default handler for the protocol (aka URI scheme) of a URL.
trans-unit.target: 这个方法返回一个URL的协议(也就是URI方案)的默认处理程序的应用程序名称。

trans-unit.source: This method returns whether or not this instance of your app is currently holding the single instance lock. You can request the lock with app.requestSingleInstanceLock() and release with app.releaseSingleInstanceLock()
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回您的应用程序的此实例当前是否持有单个实例锁。您可以使用 app.requestSingleInstanceLock() 请求锁定，并使用 app.releaseSingleInstanceLock() 释放锁

trans-unit.source: This method sets the current executable as the default handler for a protocol (aka URI scheme). It allows you to integrate your app deeper into the operating system. Once registered, all links with your-protocol:// will be opened with the current executable. The whole link, including protocol, will be passed to your application as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将当前可执行文件设置为协议（即URI方案）的默认处理程序。它使您可以将应用程序更深入地集成到操作系统中。注册后，所有带有 your-protocol:// 的链接都将使用当前的可执行文件打开。整个链接（包括协议）将作为参数传递到您的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called as early as possible in app startup, preferably before app.on('ready'). If the crash reporter is not initialized at the time a renderer process is created, then that renderer process will not be monitored by the crash reporter.
trans-unit.target: 该方法应在应用启动时尽早调用，最好在 app.on('ready') 之前调用。如果在创建渲染器进程时未初始化崩溃报告器，则崩溃报告器将不会监视该渲染器进程。

trans-unit.source: This method uses synchronous IPC when called from the renderer process. The cached value is reread from the find pasteboard whenever the application is activated.
trans-unit.target: 当从渲染器进程调用时,该方法使用同步IPC。每当应用程序被激活时,缓存的值就会从查找粘贴板中重新读取。

trans-unit.source: This method will raise an exception if the extension could not be loaded. If there are warnings when installing the extension (e.g. if the extension requests an API that Electron does not support) then they will be logged to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果该扩展不能被加载,该方法将引发一个异常。如果在安装扩展时出现了警告(例如,如果扩展请求了一个Electron不支持的API),那么这些警告将被记录到控制台。

trans-unit.source: This mode uses a software output device for rendering in the CPU, so the frame generation is much faster, thus this mode is preferred over the GPU accelerated one.

trans-unit.source: This section guides you through the basics of how Electron works under the hood. It aims at strengthening knowledge about Electron and the application created earlier in the Quickstart section.
trans-unit.target: 本节将引导您了解Electron的基本工作原理。本节旨在加强对Electron的了解,以及之前在快速入门部分创建的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This switch can not be used in app.commandLine.appendSwitch since it is parsed earlier than user's app is loaded, but you can set the ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING environment variable to achieve the same effect.
trans-unit.target: 此开关不能在 app.commandLine.appendSwitch 中使用，因为它是在加载用户应用程序之前解析的，但是您可以设置 ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING 环境变量来达到相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: This switch only works when --enable-logging is also passed.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 --enable-logging 也通过时，此开关才起作用。

trans-unit.source: This term originated in the Unix community, where "userland" or "userspace" referred to programs that run outside of the operating system kernel. More recently, the term has been popularized in the Node and npm community to distinguish between the features available in "Node core" versus packages published to the npm registry by the much larger "user" community.
trans-unit.target: 这个词起源于Unix社区,其中 "用户区 "或 "用户空间 "指的是运行在操作系统内核之外的程序。最近,这个词在Node和npm社区流行起来,以区分 "Node核心 "中的功能和更大的 "用户 "社区发布到npm注册表的包。

trans-unit.source: This toolbar is the familiar standard toolbar common control. It has a maximum of seven buttons. Each button's ID, image, tooltip, and state are defined in a structure, which is then passed to the taskbar. The application can show, enable, disable, or hide buttons from the thumbnail toolbar as required by its current state.
trans-unit.target: 这个工具条就是大家熟悉的标准工具条常用控件。它最多有7个按钮,每个按钮的ID、图像、工具提示和状态都定义在一个结构中,然后传递给任务栏。每个按钮的ID、图像、工具提示和状态都定义在一个结构中,然后传递给任务栏。应用程序可以根据当前状态的需要,显示、启用、禁用或隐藏缩略图工具栏中的按钮。

trans-unit.source: This user consent was not required on macOS 10.13 High Sierra or lower so this method will always return granted. macOS 10.14 Mojave or higher requires consent for microphone and camera access. macOS 10.15 Catalina or higher requires consent for screen access.
trans-unit.target: 在macOS 10.13 High Sierra或更低版本上不需要此用户同意，因此此方法将始终返回 granted 。macOS 10.14 Mojave或更高版本需要获得 microphone 和 camera 访问权限的同意。macOS 10.15 Catalina或更高版本需要获得 screen 访问权限的同意。

trans-unit.source: This user consent was not required until macOS 10.14 Mojave, so this method will always return true if your system is running 10.13 High Sierra or lower.

trans-unit.source: This value can only be modified before the first navigation, since the session of an active renderer process cannot change. Subsequent attempts to modify the value will fail with a DOM exception.

trans-unit.source: This value is set to false by default.
trans-unit.target: 该值默认设置为false。

trans-unit.source: This variable is set to the value of XDG_CURRENT_DESKTOP that your application originally launched with. Electron sometimes modifies the value of XDG_CURRENT_DESKTOP to affect other logic within Chromium so if you want access to the original value you should look up this environment variable instead.
trans-unit.target: 此变量设置为应用程序最初启动时使用的 XDG_CURRENT_DESKTOP 的值。Electron有时会修改 XDG_CURRENT_DESKTOP 的值以影响Chromium中的其他逻辑，因此，如果要访问原始值，则应查找此环境变量。

trans-unit.source: This will make a window maintain an aspect ratio. The extra size allows a developer to have space, specified in pixels, not included within the aspect ratio calculations. This API already takes into account the difference between a window's size and its content size.

trans-unit.source: Though asar archives are treated as directories, there are no actual directories in the filesystem, so you can never set the working directory to directories in asar archives. Passing them as the cwd option of some APIs will also cause errors.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 asar 归档文件被视为目录，但文件系统中没有实际目录，因此您永远无法将工作目录设置为 asar 归档文件中的目录。将它们作为某些API 的 cwd 选项传递也会导致错误。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, ensure you clean up any references to renderer callbacks passed to the main process. This involves cleaning up event handlers, or ensuring the main process is explicitly told to dereference callbacks that came from a renderer process that is exiting.
